trust_pages.about_html:
About ZapNest

We believe great tech shouldn't require endless research.

Our Mission

ZapNest was born from a simple frustration: finding quality tech accessories takes too much time. Reviews are paid, listings are cluttered, and most products underwhelm.

We test 50+ products every month across categories—audio, charging, organisation, connectivity. Only one makes the cut. That's what ships in your ZapNest Black Box.

The Team

We're a small team of tech enthusiasts and product designers based in India. We obsess over build quality, materials, and whether something actually improves daily life. No affiliates, no sponsored picks—just honest curation.

Why Subscription?

Discovery is part of the joy. Each month brings a new category, a new surprise. The subscription model lets us negotiate better pricing, test at scale, and pass savings to you.

Quick Questions

Who runs ZapNest?

A small team of product enthusiasts in India who test tech for a living.

Are you affiliated with brands?

No. We purchase products independently and have no affiliate relationships.
trust_pages.how_it_works_html:
How ZapNest Works

Three simple steps to premium tech, delivered monthly.

1

Choose Your Tier

Pick from Lite (₹1,599), Core (₹2,999), or Elite (₹4,999). Each tier includes curated tech suited to different budgets and preferences. All include free shipping across India.

2

We Curate & Test

Our team tests 50+ products monthly across categories—audio, charging, organisation, and more. Only products that pass rigorous quality checks make the final selection.

3

Unbox Monthly

Your Black Box arrives each month with carefully packaged tech. Each box includes a product card explaining why we chose it. Cancel anytime before the 5th of the month.

Common Questions

Can I skip a month?

Yes, pause your subscription anytime from your member dashboard.

Do I know what's coming?

The category is revealed, but the exact product is a surprise.
trust_pages.shipping_html:
Shipping & Delivery

Free delivery across India on all ZapNest subscriptions.

Delivery Timeline

All ZapNest boxes ship between the 15th and 20th of each month. Delivery typically takes 3-7 business days depending on your location. Metro cities usually receive within 3-4 days.

Tracking

Once your box ships, you'll receive a tracking link via email and WhatsApp. Track in real-time through our logistics partner's portal.

Shipping Costs

Shipping is free on all tiers—Lite, Core, and Elite. No hidden charges, no minimum order value. The price you see is the price you pay.

Delivery Partners

We work with trusted logistics partners including Delhivery and BlueDart to ensure safe and timely delivery. All packages are insured during transit.

Shipping FAQ

Do you ship internationally?

Currently, we only ship within India. International shipping is planned for 2026.

What if my package is damaged?

Contact us within 48 hours with photos. We'll send a replacement at no cost.

gsc_instructions.step_1_verify_ownership:
## Google Search Console Verification

### Option A: DNS TXT Record (Recommended)
1. Go to https://search.google.com/search-console
2. Click 'Add Property' → Enter 'zapneststore.in'
3. Select 'Domain' property type
4. Copy the TXT record value (looks like: google-site-verification=xxxxx)
5. In your DNS provider (Cloudflare/GoDaddy):
   - Add TXT record for @ (root)
   - Value: the verification string
   - TTL: Auto or 3600
6. Wait 5-10 minutes, click 'Verify' in GSC

### Option B: HTML File
1. Download the verification HTML file from GSC
2. Upload to your site root: /googlexxxxxxxx.html
3. Verify the file is accessible: https://zapneststore.in/googlexxxxxxxx.html
4. Click 'Verify' in GSC
gsc_instructions.step_2_submit_sitemap:
## Submit Sitemap
1. In GSC, go to 'Sitemaps' in left sidebar
2. Enter: sitemap.xml
3. Click 'Submit'
4. Status should show 'Success' within 24 hours
5. Verify URL count matches expected (8 URLs)
gsc_instructions.step_3_url_inspection:
## URL Inspection
1. Go to 'URL Inspection' in GSC
2. Enter: https://zapneststore.in/landing/
3. Click 'Request Indexing' if not indexed
4. Repeat for key pages: /, /about/, /how-it-works/
5. Check 'Page indexing' for any issues
gsc_instructions.step_4_mobile_usability:
## Mobile Usability Alerts
1. Go to 'Experience' → 'Mobile Usability'
2. Ensure no errors (text too small, clickable elements too close)
3. Set up email alerts: Settings → Email preferences → Mobile issues

lighthouse_ci_yaml:
name: Lighthouse CI

on:
  schedule:
    - cron: '0 6 * * 1'  # Every Monday at 6 AM UTC
  push:
    branches: [main]
  workflow_dispatch:

jobs:
  lighthouse:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4
      
      - name: Setup Node.js
        uses: actions/setup-node@v4
        with:
          node-version: '20'

      - name: Install Lighthouse CI
        run: npm install -g @lhci/cli@0.13.x

      - name: Run Lighthouse CI
        run: |
          lhci autorun --config=lighthouserc.json
        env:
          LHCI_GITHUB_APP_TOKEN: ${{ secrets.LHCI_GITHUB_APP_TOKEN }}

      - name: Upload Lighthouse Report
        uses: actions/upload-artifact@v4
        with:
          name: lighthouse-report
          path: .lighthouseci/
          retention-days: 30

remediation_guides.json_ld_warnings:
## JSON-LD Warnings

**Issue**: Google Rich Results Test shows warnings

**Fix**:
1. Check for missing required fields (name, image, offers)
2. Ensure all URLs are absolute (https://zapneststore.in/...)
3. Remove any made-up/unverified specs
4. Validate at https://validator.schema.org/

**Code fix**:
```json
{
  "@type": "Product",
  "name": "ZapNest Black Box",
  "image": "https://zapneststore.in/landing/assets/hero-black-box.png",
  "offers": {
    "@type": "Offer",
    "price": "2999",
    "priceCurrency": "INR",
    "availability": "https://schema.org/PreOrder"
  }
}
```
remediation_guides.missing_og_image:
## Missing OG Image

**Issue**: Social shares show no preview image

**Fix**:
1. Create 1200x630px image (JPEG, ≤150KB)
2. Upload to /landing/assets/og-zapnest-founders.jpg
3. Add meta tags:
```html
<meta property="og:image" content="https://zapneststore.in/landing/assets/og-zapnest-founders.jpg">
<meta property="og:image:width" content="1200">
<meta property="og:image:height" content="630">
```
4. Clear cache at https://developers.facebook.com/tools/debug/
remediation_guides.low_lcp: ## Low LCP (>2.5s) **Issue**: Largest Contentful Paint too slow **Fixes**: 1. **Preload hero image**: ```html ``` 2. **Use AVIF/WebP format** (50-70% smaller) 3. **Lazy load below-fold images**: ```html ``` 4. **Inline critical CSS** or use `` 5. **Remove render-blocking JS**: ```html ```
remediation_guides.high_cls: ## High CLS (>0.01) **Issue**: Cumulative Layout Shift too high **Fixes**: 1. **Set explicit dimensions on images**: ```html ``` 2. **Reserve space for dynamic content**: ```css .hero-image { aspect-ratio: 1/1; } ``` 3. **Avoid inserting content above visible area** 4. **Use font-display: swap and preconnect**: ```html ```
remediation_guides.robots_blocking:
## Robots.txt Blocking Pages

**Issue**: Important pages blocked by robots.txt

**Fix**:
1. Check /robots.txt for overly broad Disallow rules
2. Ensure public pages are NOT in Disallow list:
```
User-agent: *
Allow: /
Disallow: /api/
Disallow: /admin/
```
3. Use GSC → URL Inspection to verify crawlability
remediation_guides.duplicate_canonical:
## Duplicate/Conflicting Canonicals

**Issue**: Multiple canonical tags or wrong URL

**Fix**:
1. Ensure only ONE canonical tag per page
2. Use absolute URLs:
```html
<link rel="canonical" href="https://zapneststore.in/landing/">
```
3. Trailing slash consistency: pick one (with or without) and stick to it
4. Check for duplicate tags from CMS/plugins
